#summary Leaps and Bounds release notes

= How to use the game =

Go to the wiki tab and open the DemoBuilds page.<br>
Click on the link for the most recent build. (Install the Unity plug-in if necessary.)<br>
After the game loads, make you choice from the main menu page.<br>
"Start" starts the game.<br>
Choose which environment you would like to play in.<br>
At the end of a trial you will have a choice to return to the main menu, start again and choose a different scene.
